sections.heading: Objective
sections.content: Recreate the Internship Task Document using a strict templating engine and bundler setup.

sections.heading: Mandatory Technology Stack
sections.content: Nunjucks as the templating engine and Vite as the bundler.

sections.heading: Requirements
sections.content: Final output must match Task 1 exactly in formatting, emojis, links, and structure.

sections.heading: Deliverables
sections.content: Compiled HTML, source templates, README file, and a separate Git repository.
